Class Chartr::BarChart
In: lib/charts/bar_chart.rb
Parent: Chartr::Chart

Methods

labeled_data   new  

Attributes

data  [RW] 

Public Class methods

new(params = {})

Public Instance methods

labeled_data(newdata)

Takes data in the form [["foo", 1], ["bar", 2], ["bee", 3],

"bop", 4]
for the xaxis, or [1, "foo"], etc… for ‘horizontal‘

graphs (labels along the y axis).

[Validate]
